DOC.brief_summary: The aim study assess current management strategy pan-European `` real-life '' set uncover unmet need area : non-variceal gastrointestinal bleeding .
DOC.brief_title: European Survey Non-Variceal Upper Gastro Intestinal Bleeding ( NVUGIB )
DOC.criteria: Patients admit hospital inpatient overt nonvariceal upper GI bleed manifest hematemesis/coffee ground vomiting , melena , hematochezia , well clinical/laboratory evidence acute blood loss upper GI tract Evidence upper GI endoscopy perform The complete medical record available study relate hospitalization .
